snippet: KARASIK--Olga. With deep sorrow, we record the passing of our esteemed member, Olga Karasik, and extend our deepest sympathy to her husband, Benjamin, and their family. Old Westbury Golf & Country Club Barry Swidler, President for the Board of Gov...
lead_paragraph: KARASIK--Olga. With deep sorrow, we record the passing of our esteemed member, Olga Karasik, and extend our deepest sympathy to her husband, Benjamin, and their family. Old Westbury Golf & Country Club Barry Swidler, President for the Board of Governors 1/3
